Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for generating error and warning messages, as well as debugging settings. This class contains a status field which is set in the presence of errors and warnings. It also contains a field indicating the current debugging level. All messages here are emitted using the standard error (stderr) or a logger (if the -debug option is used).
